sections.heading: Employers; other liabilities not affected
sections.text: Sections 48-125.01, 48-145.01, and 48-145.02 shall not affect any other liability of the employer under the Nebraska Workers' Compensation Act.SourceLaws 1971, LB 572, ยง 21;Laws 1986, LB 811, ยง 70.
